data.title: Carmine Giovinazzo
data.text:
AKA Carmine Dominick Giovinazzo

Born: 24-Aug-1973

Birthplace: Staten Island, NY

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Det. Danny Messer on CSI: NY

Wife: Vanessa Marcil (actress, m. 11-Jul-2010)

High School: Port Richmond High School, Staten Island, NY (1991)

University: Wagner College

TELEVISION

CSI: NY Det. Danny Messer (2004-)

Shasta McNasty Scott (1999-2000)

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

Life Is Hot in Cracktown (15-May-2009) · Junkie

In Enemy Hands (25-Feb-2004)

Big Shot: Confessions of a Campus Bookie (31-Mar-2002)

Black Hawk Down (18-Dec-2001) · Goodale

The Learning Curve (5-Oct-2001)

Terror Tract (18-Oct-2000) · Frank Sarno

For Love of the Game (15-Sep-1999) · Ken Strout

The Big Brass Ring (20-Apr-1999) · Young Billy

Billy's Hollywood Screen Kiss (1998)

No Way Home (Sep-1996) · Frankie Hamm
